name: CelerX
description:
CelerX is your way to enjoy a brand new gaming world, where you can find super fun casual games to play for free or compete with other players around the world to win real cash tournaments prizes! Play for free, no ads ever!

Features:
- Game of Skill, not chance: All of the games in CelerX are skill-based without any randomness. You compete by your skill level, not by chance. Keep practicing to ramp up your game skills and win more prizes!
- Various game types: Enjoy solo, turn-based, and real-time battle games.
- Real-time interactive: Play and compete with players around the world.
- Instant prize payout: Get your prizes whenever you win. You take full control of your funds and prizes.
- Blockchain Enhanced: For some of the games in CelerX, we enable decentralized game state dispute with advanced layer-2 technology to ensure competition fairness.
